metadata.title: CVE-2022-4193 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in File System API in Google Chrome priorto 108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to bypass file systemrestrictions via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
